text: Alan Anton (1 January 1933 – 31 January 1994) was a former Australian rules footballer who played for the Fitzroy Football Club in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * * Category:1933 births Category:1994 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Fitzroy Football Club players Category:Traralgon Football Club players
title: Alan Anton (footballer)
